entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who is standing guard outside Madam Malkin's shop. He is described as stopping outside the shop and bending down to peer through the window.

entities.name: madam malkin
entities.description: Madam Malkin is mentioned as the owner of the shop where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are shopping. She is described as having a familiar voice issuing from behind a rack of dress robes.

entities.name: madam malkin's shop
entities.description: Madam Malkin's shop is mentioned as the location where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are shopping. It is described as being empty at first glance.

relationships.description: Hagrid is standing guard outside Madam Malkin's shop.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione entered the little shop together.
